Xuansi Staff Technique

After creating the capital, you will immediately get Luliang and Yingzhao, and a railway within three land cells of the {LOC_DISTRICT_CITY_CENTER_NAME} region. Each time you train a builder and pioneer, you can get another builder and pioneer. Builders +2 [Icon_Movement] movement speed, and the virtual mines -1 [ICON_Production] productivity +3 [ICON_Faith] faith. Each mine or virtual mine in the destination city can make your trade route +1 [ICON_Production] productivity for both cities, and the cost of buying merchants [ICON_Gold] -100%
